scripts.build-flow-types: cp build/mapbox-gl.js.flow dist/mapbox-gl.js.flow && cp build/mapbox-gl.js.flow dist/mapbox-gl-dev.js.flow
scripts.build-style-spec: cd src/style-spec && npm run build && cd ../.. && mkdir -p dist/style-spec && cp src/style-spec/dist/* dist/style-spec
scripts.watch-style-benchmarks: BENCHMARK_VERSION=${BENCHMARK_VERSION:-"$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) $(git rev-parse --short=7 HEAD)"} rollup -c bench/styles/rollup_config_benchmarks.js --watch
scripts.start: run-p build-token watch-css watch-dev watch-benchmarks watch-style-benchmarks start-server
scripts.build: run-s build-docs && batfish build # invoked by publisher when publishing docs on the mb-pages branch
scripts.start-docs: run-s build-prod-min build-css build-docs && DEPLOY_ENV=local batfish start
scripts.lint: eslint --cache --ignore-path .gitignore src test bench docs docs/pages/example/*.html debug/*.html
scripts.open-changed-examples: git diff --name-only mb-pages HEAD -- docs/pages/example/*.html | awk '{print "http://127.0.0.1:4000/mapbox-gl-js/example/" substr($0,33,length($0)-37)}' | xargs open
scripts.test-suite-clean: find test/integration/{render,query}-tests -mindepth 2 -type d  -not \( -exec test -e "{}/style.json" \; \) -print | xargs -t rm -r
scripts.test-cov: nyc --require=@mapbox/flow-remove-types/register --reporter=text-summary --reporter=lcov --cache run-s test-unit test-expressions test-query test-render
scripts.prepublishOnly: run-s build-flow-types build-dev build-prod-min build-prod build-css build-style-spec test-build
